com.dor.coupons.system.facades

Class CompanyFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dor.coupons.system.facades.CompanyFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CouponClientFacade

    @Component
 @Scope(value="singleton")
public class CompanyFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements CouponClientFacade

    This CompanyFacade is the functions Company users will be able to use after successfull login to the system.

    This CompanyFacade implements CouponClientFacade.

    This AdminFacade uses CompanyDBDAO, CouponDBDAO and TransactionDBDAO classes to read and write to the database.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Dor aharon

    • Constructor Detail

      • CompanyFacade

        public CompanyFacade()
        Default constractor for CompanyFacade.

    • Method Detail

      • createCoupon

        public void createCoupon(Coupon coupon)

        This createCoupon allow company users to add coupon object to the database by CouponDBDAO.

        The action will be saved at the transaction table if successed and if not by TransactionDBDAO.

        Parameters:
        coupon - The coupon object that company users want to add to the database.
        Throws:
        CouponExistsException - When company users will try to add an existing coupon to the database.

      • removeCoupon

        public void removeCoupon(Coupon coupon)

        This removeCoupon allow company users to delete coupon object from the database by CouponDBDAO.

        The action will be saved at the transaction table by TransactionDBDAO.

        Parameters:
        coupon - The coupon object that company users want to delete from the database.

      • updateCoupon

        public void updateCoupon(Coupon coupon)

        This updateCustomer allow company users to update coupon object to the database by CouponDBDAO.

        Company users can only update endDate and price details.

        The action will be saved at the transaction table by TransactionDBDAO.

        Parameters:
        coupon - The updated coupon object that company users want to update to the database.

      • getCoupon

        public Coupon getCoupon(long id)

        This getCoupon allow company users to get their coupon object by id from the database by CompanyDBDAO.

        Parameters:
        id - The id of the coupon you want to get from the database.
        Returns:
        Coupon object with the given id.
        Throws:
        CouponNotExistsException - When company users will give coupon id that not exists in the database.

      • getCouponByTitle

        public Coupon getCouponByTitle(java.lang.String title)

        This getCoupon allow company users to get their coupon object by title from the database by CompanyDBDAO.

        Parameters:
        title - The title of the coupon you want to get from the database.
        Returns:
        Coupon object with the given title.
        Throws:
        CouponNotExistsException - When company users will give coupon title that not exists in the database.

      • getAllCoupons

        public java.util.Collection<Coupon> getAllCoupons()

        This getAllCoupons allow company users to get all their coupons from the database by CompanyDBDAO.

        Returns:
        Iterable of all company's coupons objects from the database.

      • getAllCouponsByType

        public java.util.Collection<Coupon> getAllCouponsByType(CouponType couponType)

        This getAllCouponsByType allow company users to get all their coupons with given coupon type from the database by CompanyDBDAO.

        Parameters:
        couponType - Enum of the coupon type you want to get fron the database.
        Returns:
        Collection of company's coupons objects with the given coupon type.

      • getCouponsByTopPrice

        public java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCouponsByTopPrice(double price)

        This getAllCouponsByPrice allow company users to get all thier coupons whose price is lower or equel to a given price from the database by CompanyDBDAO.

        Parameters:
        price - The maximum price (of the coupon) you want to get.
        Returns:
        Collection of coupons objects whose price is lower or equal to the given price.

      • getCouponsByEndDate

        public java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCouponsByEndDate(java.util.Date endDate)

        This getAllCouponsByEndDate allow company users to get all thier coupons whose end date is before and same with given date from the database by CompanyDBDAO.

        Parameters:
        price - The maximum price (of the coupon) you want to get.
        Returns:
        Collection of coupons objects whose price is lower or equal to the given price.

      • login

        public CouponClientFacade login(java.lang.String name,
                                java.lang.String password)

        login is for all clients who want to get in the CouponSystem will have to login to get premision to use the coupon system.

        This login is for company users only

        Company name and password are send to the companyDBDAO login function to try and login to the system.

        The action will be saved at the transaction table if successed and if not by TransactionDBDAO.

        Specified by:
        login in interface CouponClientFacade
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the client who wants to login to the system.
        password - Password of the client who wants to login to the system.
        Returns:
        CompanyFacade if login Succeed.
        Throws:
        WrongUserOrPasswordException - if login failed.
